sen.j: 宝生九郎重英（ほうしょう くろう しげふさ、1900年（明治32年）7月2日 - 1974年（昭和49年）7月18日）はシテ方宝生流能楽師。
sen.e: Kuro Shigefusa HOSHO (July 2, 1900 - July 18, 1974) was a Noh actor of the Hosho school of lead actors (shite-kata).
Kuro Shigefusa HOSHO (July 2, 1900 - July 18, 1974) was a Noh actor of the Hosho school of shite-kata (lead actors).
Kuro Shigefusa HOSHO (July 2, 1900 - July 18, 1974) was a Noh actor of the Hosho school of shite-kata (lead actors).
The 17th head of the Hosho school of lead actors
The 17th head of the Hosho school.
sen.cmt: of lead actors削除、ピリオド追加
sen.e: The 17th head of the Hosho school.

sen.j: 十六世宗家宝生九郎知栄の子。
sen.e: He was a son of Kuro Tomoharu HOSHO the 16th.
He was a son of Kuro Tomoharu HOSHO, the 16th head of the school.
sen.cmt: the 16th→, the 16th head of the schoolとしました。
sen.e: He was a son of Kuro Tomoharu HOSHO, the 16th head of the school.
He was a member of the Japan Art Academy.
He was a member of the Japan Art Academy.
He was a member of the Japan Art Academy.

sen.j: 多くの実力ある門人を育てた。
